conclusion: The magnetic flux linked with one turn varies sinusoidally between +2.0 × 10⁻² Wb and –2.0 × 10⁻² Wb.
The amplitude of the magnetic flux is Φ₀ = 2.0 × 10⁻² Wb.
The period indicated on the horizontal axis is 6.28 × 10⁻² s.
The angular frequency of rotation is ω = 2π / T = 2π / (6.28 × 10⁻² s) = 100 rad s⁻¹.
For a coil of m turns, the induced emf is e(t) = m ω Φ₀ sin (ωt).
The maximum (peak) value of the induced emf is E_max = m ω Φ₀.
Calculate E_max = (100)(100 rad s⁻¹)(2.0 × 10⁻² Wb) = 200 V.
